name: Darkest Day (Binky)
description:
Submission for the GJL Game Parade 2020 jam, with the theme "Carpe Diem - Sieze the Day".

Play as Ọrunmila, the Orisha of wisdom, after he steals the sun from Khepri to prevend a world-ending disaster.

Survive the boss fights long enough to explain yourself.

Controls:
Movement: WASD, arrow keys or Numpad
Jump: up or space

Progress text: right or space
Select dialogue: up/down

Volume: PgUp/PgDn

Fullscreen is recommended for the best experience.

Credits:
Binky (Me): Programming, level design, visual layout planning, music.

Nenetl: Art, story, script, research, character designs.
Find her on Twitter @Nenetlitzi

Hope you enjoy playing this as much as we enjoyed making it!
